b15d5278f79e1a235afd8531221d5e50 (23:17): thats the only tools.jar
b7c38f62716352893884df9a2b92f6e6 (23:21): you probably should have $JAVAHOME/bin in your path
b7c38f62716352893884df9a2b92f6e6 (23:21): err $JAVA_HOME/bin ... but you get the idea
b7c38f62716352893884df9a2b92f6e6 (23:24): and it should be before any of the regular path elements, since you also have gcj installed and don't want to get those two mixed up
b15d5278f79e1a235afd8531221d5e50 (23:25): kesV dont get me wrong.. but i dont get the idea, i was already pretty like.. wtf i get my computer working with ubuntu :P
12ae33bb2232bf429eca316e6a418687 (23:25): nameless|afk:  you have both gnu java and sun's java installed from the sounds of it
12ae33bb2232bf429eca316e6a418687 (23:26): and that can be rather problematic.
12ae33bb2232bf429eca316e6a418687 (23:26): so see $PATH
b15d5278f79e1a235afd8531221d5e50 (23:26): thats rather possible.. i installed a 86mb package
b15d5278f79e1a235afd8531221d5e50 (23:26): and a 36mb package
